snippet: New England’s only thoroughbred horse racing track has told its workers it will close by the end of the year because Mohegan Sun did not win a Massachusetts casino license.
abstract: Suffolk Downs, New England's only thoroughbred horse racing track, will close at end of 2014 after Mohegan Sun fails to win a Massachusetts casino license.
lead_paragraph: New England’s only thoroughbred horse racing track has told its workers it will close by the end of the year because Mohegan Sun did not win a Massachusetts casino license.
